seo.title: Our Products - RENAPROV | Financial Services and Microfinance
seo.description: Discover all our RENAPROV financial products: savings accounts, current accounts, ORA products, SPMC, Bicard and more.
seo.keywords: financial products, savings accounts, ORA, SPMC, Bicard, microfinance, RENAPROV, Cameroon, financial services

hero.title: Our Products
hero.description: Discover our complete range of RENAPROV financial products: savings accounts, current accounts, ORA products, SPMC, Bicard and more to meet all your financial needs.
hero.imageAlt: MASO - Solidarity and assistance for all Cameroonians

filters.filterDescAll: Discover all our products and services
filters.filterDescConnexes: Money transfer and mobile payment products

features.title: All about
features.subtitle: Since 1995, Renaprov has been supporting Cameroonians by offering accessible and solidarity-based financial services. From a small institution rooted in the informal sector, we have become a national microfinance network, recognised for our proximity to clients and our commitment to social and economic development.

item1.title: Integrity & Transparency
item1.description: We act with honesty in all our operations, ensuring clear communication, fair practices and total transparency with our clients.

item2.title: Solidarity & Proximity
item2.description: Close to markets, families and traders, we place solidarity at the heart of our actions.

item3.title: Operational Excellence
item3.description: We are committed to offering reliable, effective and adapted microfinance services, with competent staff.

bankAccounts.title: Bank Accounts
bankAccounts.description: Manage your daily finances and save for your projects with our accounts tailored to all your needs.

cei.name: Individual savings account
cei.description: Save for your personal projects with attractive rates and simplified management.

cee.name: Business savings account
cee.description: Savings for businesses and organisations with dedicated benefits.

cci.name: Individual current account
cci.description: Manage your daily finances with ease and complete services.

cce.name: Business current account
cce.description: Professional account for businesses with full banking services.

cca.name: Association current account
cca.description: Account for associations and NGOs with preferential conditions.

specialized.title: Specialised Services
specialized.description: Accounts and services dedicated to different profiles with specific benefits and adapted conditions.

cs.name: Employee account
cs.description: Account dedicated to employees with benefits and privileged services.

cp.name: Private account
cp.description: Private account with exclusive benefits and personalised services.

cpub.name: Public account
cpub.description: Account for civil servants with special conditions.

cpen.name: Pensioner account
cpen.description: Account for retirees with dedicated benefits and adapted services.

spmc.name: SPMC
spmc.description: Cameroonian Mobile Payment System for fast and secure transactions.

bicard.name: Bicard
bicard.description: Multi-service payment card for all your purchases and withdrawals.

ora.title: ORA - Objective Achievement of Ambitions
ora.description: Specialised savings products to achieve your most important life projects.

oraFoncier.name: ORA Land
oraFoncier.description: Savings plan allowing the client to build a fund to acquire serviced, secure land with water and electricity, with a land title at a lower cost.

oraInvestissement.name: ORA Investment
oraInvestissement.description: Savings plan allowing the client to build a fund to promote their investment and realise their project.

oraPrevoyance.name: ORA Provident
oraPrevoyance.description: Savings plan allowing the client to build a fund to prevent happy or unfortunate events.

oraScolaire.name: ORA School
oraScolaire.description: Savings plan allowing the client to build a fund from 350 FCFA to address back-to-school issues.

oraAcademique.name: ORA Academic
oraAcademique.description: Savings plan allowing the client to build a fund from 1000 FCFA to cover tuition fees for the academic year at the IUB (BISSA√è University Institute) academic subsidiary.

oraEquipement.name: ORA Equipment
oraEquipement.description: Savings plan allowing the client to build a fund for the acquisition of furniture, IT, electronic, household appliances, etc.

oraIslamique.name: ORA Islamic
oraIslamique.description: Savings plan allowing the client to build non-remunerated savings.

oraSante.name: ORA Health
oraSante.description: Savings plan to benefit from 1000 fcfa/day health coverage at La MAMU Hospital Complex.

connex.title: Related Products
connex.subtitle: Discover our partners and complementary products for a complete financial experience

moneygram.name: MoneyGram
moneygram.description: Fast and secure international money transfers to over 200 countries.

mtn.name: MTN Mobile Money
mtn.description: Mobile payment service to carry out financial transactions via your phone.

orange.name: Orange Money
orange.description: Mobile payment solution to manage your daily finances.

ria.name: RIA Money Transfer
ria.description: International money transfers with competitive rates and reliable service.

wafacash.name: WafaCash
wafacash.description: Money transfer and mobile payment service for West Africa.

westernunion.name: Western Union
westernunion.description: International money transfers with over 500,000 service points worldwide.
